items.name: Painseeker
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: Critical Strikes do not inherently inflict non-Damaging Ailments
Inflict non-Damaging Ailments as though dealing 198% more Damage
flavourText: Lay bare paths to pain you never knew you had.

items.name: Oriath's End
explicitMods: Enemies you Kill during Effect have a 23% chance to Explode, dealing a tenth of their maximum Life as Damage of a Random Element
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: a mote of flame, kindled by fury
and all in his path were obliterated.

items.name: The Primordial Chain
implicitMods: 0.5% of Lightning Damage Leeched as Life
explicitMods: +3 to maximum number of Summoned Golems

items.name: The Stampede
explicitMods: 66% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills
36% increased Mana Regeneration Rate while moving
Your Movement Speed is 150% of its base value
flavourText: <default>{This item can be anointed by Cassia}

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2051 additional Armour
You and nearby allies gain 49% more Armour
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 81% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain +39% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will apply a cost & reservation multiplier to supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Grants Level 20 Aspect of the Spider Skill

items.name: Crest of Desire
flavourText: Expand one single ambition to crystal clarity... and beyond.

properties.name: Lightning, Spell, AoE, Chaining, Duration, Brand

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, firing a beam which deals damage to the branded enemy and those around it. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Attaches to a new Enemy after Activating, no more than once every 0.3 seconds
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 6.00 seconds
Sends a beam to the Branded Enemy
Deals 20% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

craftedMods:
Trigger a Socketed Spell when you Use a Skill, with a 8 second Cooldown

socketedItems.secDescrText: Recall your brands to you, detaching them from enemies and increasing attachment range until they next attach to an enemy. Spends a portion of each recalled brand's cost to cause it to activate.
